materials.name: 1D-coordination polymers with dinuclear rhombic {Cu2X2} cores (X = Br, I)

procedure.description: CH3CN solutions of the solid N-heteroaromatic co-ligands (prz, bpy, and nap) were prepared, while the liquid N-heteroaromatic co-ligands (meprz, dimeprz, and pym) were used as received.
A CH3CN solution of AsPh3 was added to the CH3CN solutions or liquid samples of N-heteroaromatic co-ligands, which was followed by the gradual addition of a CH3CN solution of CuX (X = Br, I).
The products were readily obtained as crystals through spontaneous evaporation.
